title: Journalism becomes a house of commons
description: Our starting point: Let’s agree that journalism is not content. It’s not a product. It’s not an export. It’s a shared resource. Treat it that way and everything changes. The idea of a journalism commons is not new (certainly not to Nieman Lab predictions), nor is it a metaphor; it’s a tried-and-trusted, locally owned governance...
